title: Searge：关于快照的兼容性问题
author: ufof
txt_content:
本帖最后由 ufof 于 2015-7-29 07:44 编辑 
Keep in mind that any world save opened with the latest snapshot will most likely not work in 1.8.x anymore. Make backups!
Searge：注意，1.8.x不再兼容由本次快照打开过的世界，请及时备份。

replies.author: Mr.Right.
replies.txt_content:
23333我懂了你们两啥意思了
